name: Fish and ship
description:
Two alien robots where travelling through space accidently fall in the Pacific Ocean... Bibou and Pouik will have to find a way to repair their ship and fly back home

Developpers : - Pierre m4j1m0 Fervel - Damien Rouxel - Vincent-Dozhwal Bagot - Florian "Eizefir" Decouflet

Sound designer: - Netarion Swan

Game artists: - Claire Penvern - Netarion Swan

Watch on the Global page https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/fish-and-ship-4
